title: How do I refund a wrong transaction on PhonePe?
content: If you mistakenly sent money to the wrong number on PhonePe, it is generally not possible to reverse the transaction directly through the app. However, you can contact PhonePe customer support 07044-6491-38/ as soon as possible to report the issue and request assistance in resolving the situation.

title: Firefox consuming way more memory then its reporting in task manager
content: Hi, I have 32 gb of memory in my system and I'm having an issue where firefox is taking up most of it but only reporting 1 or 2 gb in task manager. Im using the windows powershell command Get-Process | Sort-Object -Descending WS | select -first 1 | select -ExpandProperty ProcessName to find whats using the most memory and its listing firefox, heres a screenshot showing the issue.

content:
Hello, I can't open the security code in my email to log in to the site and the following message appears:

Please advise what to do and what the problem is? Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to ... The OCSP response does not include a status for the certificate being verified.

Error code: MOZILLA_PKIX_ERROR_OCSP_RESPONSE_FOR_CERT_MISSING

Please advise what to do and what the problem is. Thanks
